alert.note: Alert for Crockett; Gibson; Madison (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 05 at 4:53PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Crockett, southwestern Gibson and northwestern Madison Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 453 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Chestnut Bluff, or 14 miles southeast of Dyersburg, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jackson, Humboldt, Fairview, Alamo, Bells, Three Way, Adair, Medina, Maury City, Friendship, Gadsden, Quincy, Gibson Wells, Frog Jump, Mason Grove, Maury Junction, Coxville, Fruitvale, Youngs Crossing and Crockett Mills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
